Name: The Moonlight Circus
About the game: In the Moonlight Circus , you wake up in the middle of an empty circus arena, with a syringe in your arm and the feeling of being watched. Who are you? What happened? And how do you get out of here? Take on the role of the protagonist and escape the Moonlight Circus. Unravel the mystery of the circus and its artists and get out alive. Features Explore three circus areas Movement through Arm Swinging Physics based gameplay Team The Crooked Creep Creators, a team of four students realized The Moonlight Circus with the help of one Sound student and two voice actors in three months as part of their studies at the h_da. Ben Wührer - Programmer, Game Designer, Sound Manager Lara Meyer - Vision Keeper, Character Artist, 2D/3D Artist Lea Wagner - Production Manager, 3D Artist, Animator Max Rupp - Tech / 3D Artist, Lighting Artist, Shading Artist Awesome Sound & Music from: Fabjén Rauch And the voices behind our characters: Andrew Latheron Will Edmisten The Moonlight Circus was made using Unity and FMOD. HTC Vive Users: If you use a vive you have to change the controller mappings, for example switch the menu button on both sides to left primary and right primary in the SteamVR settings. Example image is in the folder with the game files.
